rule: The output must never consist of only one word, and it must represent an invalid part-of-speech tag or any unaccepted option other than "Unknown" or "CantAnswer".
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single tag 'JJ'. The description explicitly states that the chatbot should return only the part-of-speech tag, and the provided output adheres to this rule. It is a valid tag from the list provided in the description.
OK
